title: What a way to lose a ranked game.
body: So about 15 minutes ago, I was in a ranked game with some people on my friends list. Our team was walking down towards dragon and the game was pretty close. Then, as I go to clear a ward in the river, my game just completely stops. My ping jumped up to the generic show-that-your-dc'd 500 and I couldn't do anything. This lasted for about 5-10 seconds. Then, once I could move again, I walked up the enemy team, ulted them, and ran away. After about another 10 seconds, my game just crashed again and this time it wouldn't reconnect. I can confirm that it wasn't a wifi problem because I could still message people through the League client, but I couldn't reconnect. About 3 minutes later, my team lost. Now I know that you can't undo the loss or anything, but could someone please tell me what the hell happened that made me DC?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client was unable to maintain a good connection to the server. Since this came out of nowhere, it could have been caused due to a network routing issue specifically to the game server. We can check your route for problems, but first, we need to ensure all of your local network settings are good. To do this, I recommend using our [network guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) and ensure your settings are optimized per the listed steps.

Let me know if this issue happens again.
